data.description: Letâ€™s search for your next career at TEL. Use the form below to search our current opportunities and then apply. Please consider joining our Talent Community so that we may continue to engage with you.Job DescriptionPosition Summary:As a Business Intelligence Engineer Intern, you will work closely with a cross-functional team to gain practical business intelligence and analysis experience. You will be responsible for various data development and optimization tasks to contribute to the team's overall success.This internship is payrolled via payroll process provider.Responsibilities: Analyze, design, and optimize data for new and existing products used in local, networked, cloud-based, or internet-related applicationsModel data, develop workflows, and create automations to enhance applications and reports using current programming language and technologiesProvide quality assurance checks and standardization adherence, following company and team guidelinesCollaborate with users to define system requirements and identify necessary modificationsParticipate in team meetingsRequirements:Currently pursuing a BS in Computer Science, Software Engineering, Data Engineering, or related field.Must be legally authorized to work in the U.S without sponsorshipExperience working with coding in at least one programming language, such as Python, C++, Matlab, etc.SQL experience preferredStrong communication skills, including collaboration and presentation abilitiesQuick learner with problem-solving skillsHighly developed analytical and organizational abilitiesCan thrive in a fast-paced environmentEqual Opportunity Employer/Minorities/Females/Disabled/VeteransDiversity creates an innovative culture. TEL US is an Equal Employment Opportunity / Affirmative Action employer and all qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, age, national origin, protected veteran status, disability status, sexual orientation, gender identity or expression, marital status, genetic information, or any other characteristic protected by law.SubsidiaryTOKYO ELECTRON AMERICA, INC.
